title: No data tranfer via USB
content:
I'm a happy owner of a pixel 2xl phone but i've been having issues with Data transfer via USB cable.
Now we don't have any more updates i unlocked the phone, set usb debug... and then realized my PC, my work's PC, my laptop, a linux server (running ubuntu) and my wife's mac CAN'T detect my phone, and of course "adb devices" prompts nothing.
I tried 4 different cables, 3 usb A - Usb C , and my original usb C - usb C cable, factory reset  my phone (run smooth now...yeay!), i also physically cleanen the usb C port on the phone... but the problem persist... the cable only charges.
I don't know what else to try (i also tried turning on and off the bluetooth, reset the PC while USB cable still conected).
Please... any help?

Thanks in advance
